name: Gigant Robot Worm
description:
A 2 minutes game where you have to fight a gigant robot worm (duh). But, be careful! Because the less the length of the worm, the more powerful it becomes.

The game was originally intended to be part of the Blackthornprod 2021 game jam, but I missed the deadline. This is also my first game ever and it has been made in a week, so it's kinda messy, lol.

I made everything from scratch except for the font used for the dialogues and menus. The font used is Barcade Brawl by Pixel Kitchen.
